snippet: The global chief of Volkswagen, Matthias Müller, will meet Wednesday with the administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, Gina McCarthy, the regulator said.
abstract: Volkswagen global chief Matthias Muller will meet with Environmental Protection Agency administrator Gina McCarthy; regulators and manufacturer are deadlocked on how to recall 600,000 diesel vehicles rigged to evade federal emissions standards.
lead_paragraph: The global chief of Volkswagen, Matthias Müller, will meet Wednesday with the administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, Gina McCarthy, the regulator said.

headline.print_headline: Volkswagen’s Chief Will Meet With E.P.A. Head Over Recall
headline.main: Volkswagen’s Chief Will Meet With E.P.A. Head Over Recall
